last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Brett Rogers explores Johannesburg, his home town and the birthplace of some of South Africa's most successful institutions, to find the most mouth-watering food establishments, the coolest microbreweries, and the edgiest tattoo parlours.

name: Food, Booze & Tattoos
overview: Writer Brett Rogers travels to South Africa to explore the most sumptous artisanal food and beers, and the edgiest tattoo parlors, in the country.
